item.title: CRCL Stock Falls Below Its Listing Price Of $69
item.description: The stock has been on a slump, declining in five of the previous six sessions.

item.title: Bitcoin Drops Under $90,000 Again With $100 Million Liquidated In An Hour After BlackRock Sells Record BTC
item.description: The liquidation accounted for roughly a quarter of all Bitcoin liquidations over the past 24 hours.

item.title: Merck Says Its Two-Drug Regimen For HIV Treatment Proven Non-Inferior To Gilead’s Biktarvy In Study
item.description: Merck said the combination achieved suppression of the HIV virus at week 48, similar to Biktarvy in the late-stage study.

item.title: Amentum Positioned For Massive Nuclear Buildout, Says Citron Research
item.description: In a post on the X platform, Citron Research said that Amentum is positioned to manage almost 90% of America’s Department of Energy (DOE) nuclear oper...

item.title: TPST Stock Plummets After Inking Deal To Acquire CAR-T Programs From Privately-Held Firm In All-Stock Transaction
item.description: The transaction is expected to close in early 2026, provided it receives all required approvals.
